動物用藥品名稱: 喜伯樂豬黴漿菌肺炎不活化菌苗
效能(適應症): 預防豬黴漿菌肺炎感染。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: INACTIVATED MYCOPLASMA HYOPNEUMONIAE STRAIN J…>=1.0 GUINEA PIG-ED80 (不活化前1×10^7 CCU/ML).COMPONENTS OF ADJUVANT: LEVAMISOLE (AS HYDROCHLORIDE)…1.8 MG;CARBOMER…10 MG;  SODIUM METABISULPHITE…0.1 MG; SODIUM HYDROXIDE…4 MG.EXCIPIENT: METHYL PARAHYDROXIBENZOATE…2.4 MG; SODIUM CHLORIDE…10 MG; WATER FOR INJECTION…TO 2 ML.
